title: 求帮忙翻译一句话。。。
author: Aikini
txt_content:
一句英语
我去找作者问是否可以搬运的时候作者回的一句话
大体意思我是知道的，但是我不是很明白中间那句话是什么意思
 It'd be very nice if you translate the plugin into Chinese. While you don't get into the code, mark me as the author, put a link into the spigot or bukkit page of the plugin and you don't start making money of it I won't have problems. Ones you have posted the plugin give me a link to see it.就是这句话我不是很明白作者在说什么
While you don't get into the code, mark me as the author, put a link into the spigot or bukkit page of the plugin and you don't start making money of it I won't have problems.没搞懂翻译不敢搬运emm

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Aikini
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-12 16:08
第一段的大概意思就是：如果你愿意汉化他，那真是太好了，但是要标记原作者，原帖链接要填bukkit的地址
第 ...
谢谢dalao,了解了

replies.author: kry5
replies.txt_content: 虽然你没有进入代码，把我标记为作者，将链接放入插件的插口或bukkit页面，你不开始赚钱我不会有问题。
